shared.footer: <small>This is a Canvas API demo intended for web development enthusiasts.</small>

index.title: Set of WebDev Examples
index.metaDescription: Explore a collection of web development examples that make use of essential tools and resources.

header.paragraph: Open a project by clicking on its name in the list.

index.footer: Created by: JulioGitLab

dinner.title: Project 1: Dinner
dinner.metaDescription: A dinner plate in a canvas. Intended for web development enthusiasts.
dinner.p1: Some figures drawn as a demonstration.
dinner.p2: The cheese holes, tortilla burn marks, steak grill marks, and beans are randomly positioned each time the page is loaded.

night.title: Project 2: Night Animation
night.metaDescription: An animated cityscape at night drawn on a canvas. Intended for web development enthusiasts.
night.p1: The stars in the background are added in random positions every time the page loads.
night.p2: The comet and shooting star keep reappearing in random positions.
night.p3: Click on the canvas to add stars at the pointer position.

attack.title: Project 3: Animal Attack
attack.metaDescription: An animation of a bird growing in a canvas. Intended for web development enthusiasts.
attack.p: The bird's size increases, and when its eyes (which grow faster) cover the entire canvas, everything returns to its original size and starts growing again.

ad.title: Project 4: Ad
ad.metaDescription: An animated ad on a canvas. Intended for web development enthusiasts.
ad.li1: The text color changes during the animation.
ad.li2: The triangular figure moves from the top-left to the bottom-right as it also grows and changes color.
ad.li3: The color of the ellipses changes depending on the mouse position on the canvas.
ad.li4: The triangle's movement restarts once it moves out of the canvas, and its colors, as well as those of the text, are reset.

fishbowl.title: Project 5: Fishbowl
fishbowl.metaDescription: An interactive fishbowl drawn using the processing.js library. Intended for web development enthusiasts.
fishbowl.p1: This is an interactive canvas created with the processing.js library.
fishbowl.p2: All the colors are set randomly when the page loads, except for the background, fish body, and mouth.
fishbowl.p3: The positions of all the figures are also random.
fishbowl.p4: Click on the canvas to add new bubbles in random positions!
fishbowl.footer: <small>This is a demo of the processing.js library, designed for web development enthusiasts.</small>

survey.title: Project 6: Coders survey
survey.metaDescription: Project on how to create a form. Intended for web development enthusiasts.
survey.p: Please take the time to help us improve
survey.name: Name: <input id='name' name='name' type='text' placeholder='full name' required />
survey.email: Email: <input id='email' name='email' type='email' placeholder='email@email.com' required />
survey.radio: Do you want to be better?
survey.comment: Any comments?:<textarea id='comment' name='comment' rows='5' cols='31' placeholder='I think...' ></textarea>
survey.footer: <small>This is a form creation demo intended for web development enthusiasts.</small>
